scripts.excalidraw-publish: cd excalidraw/src/packages/excalidraw && node version.js && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.excalidraw-commit-push: cd excalidraw && git add . && git commit -m 'up' && git push
scripts.push-frontend: cd dist && git add . && git commit -m 'up' && git push
scripts.release-second: cd desktop && deno compile --no-check --allow-all --unstable --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output GalaxyBrowser main.ts
scripts.release-second-ai: cd desktop && deno compile --no-check --allow-all --unstable --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output GalaxyBrowser main.ts -- --openai-key=$(cat .openai-key)
scripts.dev-desktop: cd desktop && DEV=true OPENAI_KEY=$(cat .openai-key) deno run --allow-all --unstable main.ts
scripts.pull-submodules: git -C contract checkout main && git -C contract pull origin main && git -C desktop checkout main && git -C desktop pull origin main && git -C desktop/deno-webui checkout main && git -C desktop/deno-webui pull origin main && git -C desktop/dynamic-import checkout main && git -C desktop/dynamic-import pull origin main && git -C desktop/installer checkout main && git -C desktop/installer pull origin main && git -C desktop/webui checkout main && git -C desktop/webui pull origin main && git -C dist checkout main && git -C dist pull origin main && git -C excalidraw checkout master && git -C excalidraw pull origin master
